contest-event.event-date: Oct. 19, 1963 D National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) 1 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) national-finals-championship-section European Championships The current Nationals contest began in 1900, but there was a previous 'Nationals' contest run 40 years earlier: Enderby Jackson's Great National Contest. Championship The Belmont Variations Royal Albert Hall, Kensington, Kensington and Chelsea, Greater London, England, UK The Baton of Honour was given to Alex Mortimer. The Dipoma of Honour was given to Ernest Burgis. Sept. 23, 2010, 10:33 a.m. Oct. 14, 2011, 3:06 p.m. 1 City of Manchester Alex Mortimer 2 Brighouse and Rastrick Band Walter B.
